titleStmt.title: The St. Giles's broker. Shewing how he was cheated in buying a green goose, with an account of several sorrowful circumstances which follow'd thereupon. To the tune of, Ladies of London. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "There was a wealthy old broker of late ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
